categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ladra was a female Sith Pureblood Revanite during the Cold War. She resided in the Revanite compound on Dromund Kaas. Once the apprentice and personal assassin of Lord Grathan, she then served The Master and her students holding the title of Serene Protector of the Order of Revan. She asked a new cult member to recover an object that had been lost for a very long time, Revan's mask.
